front.title: One-way/Two-way Active Measurement Protocol Extensions for Performance Measurement on LAG

abstract.t: This document defines extensions to One-way Active Measurement Protocol (OWAMP), and Two-way Active Measurement Protocol (TWAMP) to implement performance measurement on every member link of a Link Aggregation Group (LAG). Knowing the measured metrics of each member link of a LAG enables operators to enforce the performance based traffic steering policy across the member links.
